h2_title: Where To Use The Loong Scales in Black Myth: Wukong
h3_title: Loong Scale Use: Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat
content: Directly to the right of the Rockrest Flat Shrine you can find the sand waterfall. With the Loong Scales in your inventory you can head through it and defeat Black Loong on the other side.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loong_Scales.md', within the main section titled 'Loong Scales', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Loong Scales in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Loong Scale Use: Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat'.
The content is as follows:
Directly to the right of the Rockrest Flat Shrine you can find the sand waterfall. With the Loong Scales in your inventory you can head through it and defeat Black Loong on the other side.
